name: Healthyfied Garlic Broccoli
description: This Healthyfied Garlic Broccoli recipe is a nutrient-rich side dish that aligns perfectly with a low-carb and low-sugar diet. Embrace a healthier lifestyle with this simple yet delicious recipe, ideal for anyone seeking wholesome, healthy recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the broccoli by rinsing it under cold water, then cut it into florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to a boil and briefly blanch the broccoli florets for about 2 minutes. Drain and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the extra virgin olive oil over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched broccoli florets to the pan, season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally until the broccoli is tender and flavorful.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
